tooltip.lost_lore.ancient_light_ball.too: §7A rare relic from a distant time - it has a strange effect on female Pichu§r
tooltip.lost_lore.binding_armor.tooltip: §7Focuses and restrains Mewtwo's Powers by covering him with a Binding Armor Set§r
tooltip.lost_lore.corrupted_wish.tooltip: §7A wish tag granted by Jirachi, tainted by evil intentions - it turns Groudon into a Virus like Creature§r
tooltip.lost_lore.costume_box_incineroar: §7A Box full of Incineroar's favorite costumes§r
tooltip.lost_lore.costume_box_lucario.to: §7A Box full of Lucario's favorite costumes§r
tooltip.lost_lore.dark_tyranitarium_z.to: §7Z-Crystal associated with the Black Tyranitar and allows it to upgrade its Rock Wrecker into the special Z Move Kaiju Cataclysm§r
tooltip.lost_lore.dream_catcher.tooltip: §7An Item associated with Mismagius which allows it to possess the power of dreams and fuse with Rayquaza§r
tooltip.lost_lore.green_scarf.tooltip: §7A scarf typically worn by the Mystery Dungeon Team§r
tooltip.lost_lore.pledge_fragment.toolti: §7A piece of a rock where pledges are made. It has a strange effect on Keldeo§r
tooltip.lost_lore.red_scarf.tooltip: §7A scarf typically worn by the Mystery Dungeon Team§r
tooltip.lost_lore.ripped_cape.tooltip: §7A torn cape bearing the Pokédex number of Celebi, particularly liked by Zarude§r
tooltip.lost_lore.shadow_energy.tooltip: §7It corrupts some Pokémon with its strange Aura§r
tooltip.lost_lore.shadow_mewtwonite_x.to: §7This corrupted Megastone allows Shadow Mewtwo to Mega Evolve into Shadow Mega X§r
tooltip.lost_lore.shadow_mewtwonite_y.to: §7This corrupted Megastone allows Shadow Mewtwo to Mega Evolve into Shadow Mega Y§r
tooltip.lost_lore.slowbrogonite.tooltip: §7Allows Galarian Slowbro to Mega Evolve into Galarian Mega Slowbro§r
tooltip.lost_lore.time_gear.tooltip: §7When resonating with Dialga, it unshackles its Primal instincts§r
tooltip.lost_lore.water_shuriken.tooltip: §7A rare shuriken that allows you to change the appearance of Battle Bond Greninja§r
